content.description: Louvre, Paris, France © Peter Willi / Bridgeman Images
content.question: The artist who painted the Greek vase shown created a sense of naturalism by using

choices.label: hot wax mixed with pigments to create rich layers of colors
single-point perspective to create an illusion of depth
shading to create a sense of volumetric form and mass
fine lines to depict the muscles and contours of the figure’s body

content.answer: fine lines to depict the muscles and contours of the figure’s body

topic.text: 2.1: Cultural Contexts of Ancient Mediterranean Art

skill.text: Skill 5.B: In analyzing a work of art beyond the image set, explain how artistic decisions about form, style, materials, technique, and/or content shape a work of art (or group of related works of art).
